pageTitle: POSERA-HDX LTD (HDX:Toronto): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {11426=Posera-HDX Limited Presents at Cambridge House International Canadian Investor Conference Vancouver 2015, May-31-2015 11:30 AM. Venue: Vancouver Convention Centre West, 1055 Canada Place, Vancouver V6C 0C3, British Columbia, Canada., 12039=Posera-HDX Ltd. announced consolidated earnings results for the first quarter ended March 31, 2015. For the quarter, the company reported total revenue of $4,746,061, an increase of $24,437 (0.5%) compared to $4,721,624 for the three-months ended March 31, 2014. The company has stated an objective to recognize the gross payment processing fees as payments processing revenue through future acquisitions. Had the company recorded the gross payment processing fees as payment processing revenue the company would have achieved adjusted total revenue of $8,519,361, an increase of $1,430,75 (20.2%) compared to $7,088,646 for the three-months ended March 31, 2014. Net loss was $1,118,878, an increase of $679,893 from a loss of $438,985 for the three-months ended March 31, 2014. EBITDA loss was $648,020, an increase in the loss by $493,680 from an EBITDA loss of $154,340 for the three-months ended March 31, 2014. Normalized EBITDA loss was $563,221, an increase in the loss by $353,380 from a normalized EBITDA loss of $209,841 for the three-months ended March 31, 2014., 13452=Posera-HDX Limited, Annual General Meeting, Jun 24, 2015., at 16:00 US Eastern Standard Time. Location: Gowling Lafleur Henderson LLP, Suite 1600. Agenda: To receive the financial statements of the corporation for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2014; to elect directors for the upcoming year; to appoint auditors and to authorize the directors to fix their remuneration; and to transact such further and other business as may properly come before the meeting or any adjournment thereof.}
